node.excerpt: So yesterday  ReactConf  started with the opening keynote of Sophie Alpert and Dan Abramov about “React Today and Tomorrow”.
Let me kidnap you to the world of  MDX-Deck . This project was on my radar for a while and I had the opportunity to test it for a…
